effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 749,791.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 749,791.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

(2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to create a floating orb of Fire Pollen nearby. Stepping into the orb will gather it, increasing your highest secondary stat by 1,045 for 12 sec. Up to 2 allies who step near you during this time will also receive 130 of a random secondary stat for 12 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has the chance to grant Beledar's Blessing granting 823 Versatility for 15 sec. 

Moving within 3 yards of a party or raid member grants them a portion of Beledar's Blessing, sharing the effect for the remaining duration.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
